rukus.text: 56|2|[Xohed did, ki] Dar vuqui on duruƣe nest
56|3|[Guruhero] Xor mekunad va [guruhero] raf'ati maqom meʙaxsad
56|4|On goh ki zamin ʙa saxti larzonda savad
56|7|Va sumo ʙa se guruh taqsim saved
56|8|[Naxust] Saodatmandon [hastand]; ci saodatmandone [va ci naku cojgohe]
56|9|Va [guruhi digar] tiraʙaxton [hastand]; ci tiraʙaxtone [va ci ʙad cojgohe]
56|10|Va [savumin guruh] pesgomon, ki [dar nekiho] saʙqat giriftand
56|13|Guruhi ʙisjore az onon dar zumrai pesinijon hastand [xoh az ummati islom jo az ummathoi guzasta]
56|17|Navcavonone hamvora sodoʙ girdi onon [ʙa xidmat] megardand
56|18|Bo comho va kuzaho va qadahhoe az saroʙi cori
56|19|[Saroʙe] Ki az nusidanas sardard namegardand va dastxusi masti namesavand
56|25|Dar on co [suxani] jova va gunoholud naxohand sunid
56|26|Dar on co suxane cuz salom va durud [-i faristagon va ʙihistijon] nest
56|33|ki na tamom savad va na mamnu' gardad
56|35|Va hamsarone, ki ʙo ofarinise viƶa padid ovardem [ki zeʙoi va cavonii covidon dorand]
